name: NPR
text:
The first night of the Democratic National Convention will include dozens of speakers across the U.S., including:

🎤 Michelle Obama
🎤 Bernie Sanders
🎤 Andrew Cuomo
🎤 Gretchen Whitmer
🎤 Catherine Cortez Masto
🎤 John Kasich
https://t.co/YWrj4kN6Yk

name: NPR
text:
The Democratic National Convention kicks off this evening and runs through Thursday. Here are 5 things to keep in mind.
https://t.co/i5DhecHi0g

name: NPR
text:
“I know Joe. He is a profoundly decent man guided by faith,” Michelle Obama says in a prerecorded video released by the DNC. "He knows what it takes to rescue an economy, beat back a pandemic and lead our country. And he listens."
https://t.co/KgrMtcWKOO

name: NPR
text:
The first night of an unprecedented, all-virtual DNC is about to begin — with speeches from Michelle Obama, Bernie Sanders and others.

Follow along as NPR reporters and editors provide real-time analysis ⤵️
https://t.co/BkqPc2cLta

name: NPR
text:
After nearly two decades, federal prosecutors have announced charges against two men in connection with the fatal shooting of Run-DMC's Jam Master Jay in 2002.
https://t.co/kdBgEq6wTI
